name: @suitest/smst-to-html
description: Utility to convert SMST to HTML

scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && npm run compile && npm run compress && cp ./lib/suitest-test-line.css ./
scripts.compress: for file in ./dist/*.js; do npx terser --compress --mangle -o $file -- $file; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run coverage && npm run build
